tests.game.ai.shared.model

Class TestTictactoeBoard

  • java.lang.Object
    • tests.game.ai.shared.model.TestAbstractBoard
      • tests.game.ai.shared.model.TestTictactoeBoard

  • public class TestTictactoeBoard
extends TestAbstractBoard
    This test for IBoard, AbstractBoard and TictactoeBoard by using JUnit4 and Mockito

    1.0

    btdiem
